## PerformanceTrace.getAttribute() method

Retrieves the value which a custom attribute is set to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAttribute(attr: string): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attr | string | Name of the custom attribute. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
